name: SCP 049 Plague (DEMO)
description:
SCP-049 is a game oddly enough about SCP-049. In it, you must wander through the secret laboratory of the SCP and destroy the plague.

 The game is written on Game Maker Studio 2, while this is just a demo, soon I plan to expand this game by adding more SCPs besides 049, but this is in the future.

       I hope you enjoy this game as well as SirenHead.
